TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_A-lin, title = A-lin, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/A-lin} }

S.FORM: A lin A lin, u ngangan nu Pangcah sa ci Lisang Pacidal Koyouan, u ngangan nu Hulam sa ci . nalecuhan ciniza i 1983 a mihcaan, 9 a bulad, 20 a demiad. nalecuh i Kaoshongse Linyachu. u wawa nu Pangcah. namaala yadah ku kaulah u nu Taywan. zuma satu namudadiw ciniza i tina pakaulahay a kakitizaan. u kawaw niza 1999 a mihcaan, mudadiw ciniza tu Nantou 921 ninel malabadesay a wawa, maazih tunu ci Jason. sepat a mihcaan sa, tina tatusaay malitemuh i EZ5, mukan tu pahay a patyamay, sisa miketun tina tatusaay i 2005 a mihcaan 4 a bulad 15 a demiad. kya niketunay a lacul sa, u cacay a bataan a mihcaan misanga' siwa nalimaan. palaacawa atu musabilil namulecuh 2007 a mihcaan 5 a bulad, namacumud ciniza tu sakapahay a baluhayay a mudadiway. 6 a bulad sa, patahkal sakacacay a EP nalimaan. nazikuzaan sa, zayhan palaacawa atu namulecuh lalekalan, matenes caay patahkal tu nalimaan. 2008 a mihcaan 8 a bulad, patahkal tu ciniza sakatusa a nalimaan, macumud ciniza tu sakapahay a tatayna mudadiway. nalimaan 2006 02 10 milemu' caay siilu 2008 08 15 u tatenga'ay a tatayna mudadiway 2009 12 28 naayaway atu nazikuzazan 2010 12 24 aniwiw caykaadada' 2011 11 18 amakapahtu kami 2012 12 30 sakadahitu uzuma i ? 2014 12 30 siilu i balucu' 2017 09 20 A lin malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan wikipayke A lin nasulitan ni Tuku Sayun nay pabalucu'ay a kawaw nu Yincumincuweiyuanhuy 2018 tusa
